subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=64|rad=手|as=18|sn=21|canj=QBWI|four=|ids=⿰扌爵}}

# to select, to choose, to pick out
# to lift, to carry on the shoulders -- of two or more men
# to wipe out
# to brush over lightly
# to carry, to take or bring along at one's convenience
# to cut, to par, to trim, to shave
